https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f7q7IxU1VR6inD7gcsve0vBhZOs.jpg In this 30-minute interview, Oprah Winfrey sits down with director Ava DuVernay to discuss her Oscar-nominated film, historical cycles of oppression and the broken prison system. 13th: A Conversation with Oprah Winfrey & Ava DuVernay
